Author: stephxxi
Text: I feel you. People at work call me “skinny” and “little” often. Sometimes it makes me feel good and validated ^TM , but other times I feel like they’re just lying to me because i’m not even close to being underweight at all.

Author: ri-ri
Text: I get that and I felt the same. Ashamed, embarrassed and just guilty for being called skinny.   Since then I’ve reached a healthy weight so..
